item.title: $patial Proposal
item.description: Title $patial - an application to allow users to visualise the effects of spatial autocorrelation between attributes used in determining resale price of flats Motivation Public housing in Singapore is uniquely different, the flats are home to over 80% of the Singapore citizens of which 90% own their own homes. Over the years, policymakers, town planners have placed great emphasis on modelling housing prices as a Housing Development Board (HDB) flat is one of the largest financial commitments for Singapore citizens.
